name: improbability engine
description:
improbability engine

Enemy forces are in hot pursuit of your spaceship, and a stray missile damages your engine! Will you be able to repair its Escheresque internals in time?

A short point 'n click puzzle game made for LD48 in 72 hours.

cheat codes (light spoilers ahead)

If you get stuck, or just want to move on to other parts of the game, here is a list of cheat codes you can enter. Make sure the game is focused by clicking into it at least once before typing the code.

  • skip to scene (only from the title screen or the intro):
    • enter – before entering the engine
    • greet – meeting the engine
    • helix – fixing the engine pistons
    • inner – further inside
    • final – final cutscene
  • skip a puzzle
    • reach – skip the access code puzzle
    • flowy – skip any of the pipe puzzles
    • rubix – skip the final Rubik's cube puzzle
